mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ESSAY(EMAIL, FIELD, LANG, ETITLE, ECONTENT) VALUES(#{email}, #{field},#{lang}, #{etitle}, #{econtent})
mapper.select: SELECT e.eno, e.email, e.field, e.lang, e.etitle, e.econtent, m.photo, (SELECT count(*) FROM recommend WHERE eno = #{eno})likecnt, e.regdate FROM essay e JOIN member m ON e.EMAIL = m.email WHERE eno = #{eno}

SELECT e.eno, e.email, m.mname, g.field, g.lang, e.etitle, e.econtent, (SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM recommend r WHERE r.email = essay.email AND r.eno = essay.eno)likecnt FROM essay WHERE essay.eno = e.eno)likecnt, e.regdate FROM essay e JOIN member m ON e.email = m.email JOIN guider g ON e.email = g.email ORDER BY e.eno DESC LIMIT 0,4
